channel.title: Need help!pk source
channel.description:
to start off. i am a new coder. i got a pk source i want to add random drops.
what do i mean:once player kills another player random drop shows up just like runescape. if anyone could help it will be very helpfull.
please show full code/how to do it. because im a new coder as i said above. ty everyone.
